hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT PeriodType,Number,DateFrom,Culture,COUNT(*) AS [Priority] FROM (SELECT pp.PeriodType,pp.Number,pp.DateFrom,Person.Culture, ISNULL( ( SELECT CASE WHEN ISNULL(p.LeavingDate,'20591231 00:00') < MIN(DATEADD(DAY,-1,ISNULL(pp2.DateFrom,'20591231 00:00'))) THEN ISNULL(p.LeavingDate,'20591231 00:00') ELSE MIN(DATEADD(DAY,-1,ISNULL(pp2.DateFrom,'20591231 00:00'))) END FROM scheduleperiod pp2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE pp2.parent = pp.parent AND pp2.DateFrom > pp.DateFrom ) ,ISNULL(p.LeavingDate,'20591231 00:00')) AS EndDate FROM scheduleperiod pp WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Person WITH (NOLOCK) ON Person.Id = pp.Parent INNER JOIN readmodel.GroupingReadOnly p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.PersonId = pp.Parent and p.StartDate <= :date and p.EndDate >= :date WHERE p.BusinessUnitId = :businessUnit AND pp.DateFrom <= isnull(p.LeavingDate,'20591231 00:00')) AS x WHERE x.EndDate >= :date and x.DateFrom <= :date GROUP BY PeriodType,Number,DateFrom,Culture ORDER BY [Priority] DESC

SELECT PeriodType,Number,DateFrom,Culture,COUNT(*) AS [Priority] FROM (SELECT pp.PeriodType,pp.Number,pp.DateFrom,person.Culture, ISNULL( ( SELECT CASE WHEN ISNULL(p.LeavingDate,'20591231 00:00') < MIN(DATEADD(DAY,-1,ISNULL(pp2.DateFrom,'20591231 00:00'))) THEN ISNULL(p.LeavingDate,'20591231 00:00') ELSE MIN(DATEADD(DAY,-1,ISNULL(pp2.DateFrom,'20591231 00:00'))) END FROM scheduleperiod pp2 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE pp2.parent = pp.parent AND pp2.DateFrom > pp.DateFrom ) ,ISNULL(p.LeavingDate,'20591231 00:00')) AS EndDate FROM scheduleperiod pp WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Person person WITH (NOLOCK) ON person.Id = pp.Parent INNER JOIN readmodel.GroupingReadOnly p WITH (NOLOCK) ON p.PersonId = pp.Parent and p.StartDate <= :date and p.EndDate >= :date WHERE p.BusinessUnitId = :businessUnit AND pp.DateFrom <= isnull(p.LeavingDate,'20591231 00:00') AND person.Id in (:personIds)) AS x WHERE x.EndDate >= :date GROUP BY PeriodType,Number,DateFrom,Culture ORDER BY [Priority] DESC
